text: What is the maximum amount of the buckets per project?

answers.text: 10 Buckets initially. You will contact support to request additional buckets

text: Which of the following statements is true?

answers.text: A bucket name must be unique within your project.
A bucket name must be globally unique across any project regardless of owners.

text: Which of the following describes the process of renaming a GCS bucket?

answers.text: Switch the bucket to readonly mode and rename the bucket, saving it first.
Use the copy bucket function, choose the bucket you wish as the source bucket. and the desired name for the destination bucket. The bucket new bucket will be created as an outcome of this process
If the bucket is empty, simply delete the bucket and create a new one with you desired name
If the bucket has data, then create a new bucket with the desired name, then migrate the data from old bucket to the new one. When the data is migrated, finally delete the old bucket.
